title: Michael Moorcock
summary: Michael John Moorcock (born 18 December 1939) is an English writer, best-known for science fiction and fantasy, who has published a number of well-received literary novels as well as comic thrillers, graphic novels and non-fiction. He has worked as an editor and is also a successful musician. He is best known for his novels about the character Elric of Melnibon√©, a seminal influence on the field of fantasy since the 1960s and '70s.[2]
